entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 21.7°C

entry.title: Sunday: Smoke. High 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Widespread smoke early this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 this afternoon. High 24. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 12:23 PM CST Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 12:23 PM CST Sunday 08 May 2016
